description: E.g.f. satisfies A(x) = 1 + x * A(x / (1 - x)).
prog: (PARI) Vec( serlaplace( 1 + x * serlaplace( exp(exp(x) - 1)))) /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 14 1999 */(Sage) [factorial(m)*bell_number(m-1) for m in xrange (0,17)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 06 2008
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Mar 15 1999
